config.language.changedDescription: The language of Yoki has been changed to English (USA).
mute.title: You have been muted
mute.description: <@%s>, you have been muted for %s minutes.
mute.noRoleDescription: There is no mute role configured for this server.
mute.badDurationDescription: Your mute duration must be longer than 15 minutes.
mute.error: There was an issue muting this user. This is most likely due to misconfigured permissions for your server.
unmute.title: You have been unmuted
unmute.description: <@%s>, you have been manually unmuted by a staff member of this server.
unmute.error: There was an issue removing mute from this user. This is most likely due to misconfigured permissions for your server.
note.title: Moderation note added
note.description: <@%s>, you have successfully added a new moderation note on %s (%s).
warn.title: You have been warned
warn.description: <@%s>, you have been manually warned by a staff member of this server.
warn.error: There was an issue warning this user.
kick.error: There was an issue kicking this user. This is most likely due to misconfigured permissions for your server.
ban.error: There was an issue banning this user. This is most likely due to misconfigured permissions for your server.
